title: anbuLLa karpakamE
sahitya:
anbuLLa karpakamE Om sharaN annai parAshakti punnakai veLLamE


anupallavi

  tunbattait-tuDaittiDum inba shuDaroLiyE sutantramAghiya padam tarum durgaiyE


caraNam    parama turiya jnAnam paravum mahEshvariyE paghaivarai norukkiDa balam tarum kALiyE
ariya varangaLellAm aruLum tirumaghaLE arum kalai vaLamellAm tarum kalaivANiyE
